verses.text: There was also a \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* for the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; for he \add was\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*; \add to wit\add*, for \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*: because he was a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, therefore he had \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* and \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

There was also \add a lot\add* for the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*; for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiezer|strong="H0044"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helek|strong="H2507"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asriel|strong="H0844"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7928"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemida|strong="H8061"\w*: these \add were\add* the \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.\f + \fr 17.2 \ft Abiezer: also called, Jeezer\f*

¶ But \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, but \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: and these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, and \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, and \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

And they came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*. Therefore according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

And there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w portions|strong="H2256"\w* to \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, beside the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* and \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, which \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*;

Because the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w had|strong="H5157"\w* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: and the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of \w Manasseh’s|strong="H4519"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* had the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

¶ And the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* was from \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* to \w Michmethah|strong="H4366"\w*, that \add lieth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w along|strong="H1980"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* unto the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w En-tappuah|strong="H5887"\w*.

\add Now\add* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* had the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w*: but \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w* on the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add belonged\add* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*;

And the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kanah|strong="H7071"\w*, \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*: these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add are\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* also \add was\add* on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, and the \w outgoings|strong="H8444"\w* of it were at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*:\f + \fr 17.9 \ft river Kanah: or, brook of reeds\f*

\w Southward|strong="H5045"\w* \add it was\add* \w Ephraim’s|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* \add it was\add* \w Manasseh’s|strong="H4519"\w*, and the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* is his \w border|strong="H1366"\w*; and they met \w together|strong="H6293"\w* in \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and in \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*.

And \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* had in \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* and in \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w Ibleam|strong="H2991"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Endor|strong="H5874"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, \add even\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w countries|strong="H5316"\w*.

Yet the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \add the inhabitants of\add* those \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*; but the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w would|strong="H2974"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Yet it came to pass, when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were waxen \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, that they \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* to \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*; but did not \w utterly|strong="H3423"\w* drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hast thou \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me \add but\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w portion|strong="H2256"\w* to \w inherit|strong="H5159"\w*, seeing I \add am\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, forasmuch \w as|strong="H5704"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* me \w hitherto|strong="H3541"\w*?

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* them, If thou \add be\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add then\add* get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* \add country\add*, and cut \w down|strong="H1254"\w* for thyself there in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w* and of the \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*, if \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* be too \w narrow|strong="H0213"\w* for thee.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft giants: or, Rephaims\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* is not \w enough|strong="H4672"\w* for us: and all the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* have \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \add both they\add* who \add are\add* of \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and \add they\add* who \add are\add* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \add even\add* to \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and to \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou \add art\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and hast \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: thou shalt not have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \add only:\add*

But the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* shall be thine; for it \add is\add* a \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*, and thou shalt cut it \w down|strong="H1254"\w*: and the \w outgoings|strong="H8444"\w* of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, though they have \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \add and\add* though they \add be\add* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*.
